Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulins A, G, M, D, And E Immunological Test System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Beckman Coulter AU/DxC AU clinical chemistry analyzers
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Beckman Coulter Total Immunoglobulin E (IgE) turbidimetric immunoassay for quantitative measurement of IgE using AU/DxC AU clinical chemistry analyzers
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative determination of Total Immunoglobulin E (IgE) concentration in human serum and plasma on Beckman Coulter AU/DxC AU clinical chemistry analyzers; aids diagnosis of IgE-mediated allergic disorders in conjunction with other clinical findings
